function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor activities are closely related to virus spreading risk","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Implement pandemic-responsive design strategies to reduce the risk of infection","Technologies":"Advanced air ventilation systems, spatial planning and circulation patterns, selection of building materials","People":"Building occupants, residents","Owner":"Architects, designers, building owners"}]}
